Hero.text: I am a Full Stack developer from Brazil with over 1 year of experience. While I work across all layers of web development, I have a strong inclination towards front-end. I enjoy solving problems and am always open to new possibilities in the future. Let's build something amazing together!

About.title: About me
About.description1: My journey in the technology field began in 2016 when I graduated as an IT Technician from São Paulo State University (Unesp). In August 2019, I started my undergraduate studies in Information Systems at the Federal University of Uberlândia (UFU), and since then, I have been constantly striving to learn and deepen my knowledge in the field.
About.description2: Currently, I am a Full Stack Developer, and although I work across all layers of web development, I have a strong inclination towards Front-End development, always aiming to maintain a high standard of code quality.
About.description3: In addition, I have experience in Traffic Management, Data Analysis, and Administrative Activities, areas in which I worked for over two years. I am always seeking new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a professional.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.description: Check out some of the projects I have developed throughout my career as a developer below

EducationExperience.title: Qualifications
EducationExperience.education-description: Here are some of my educational experiences where I gained knowledge and skills.
EducationExperience.experience-description: Here are some of my professional experiences. I am always open to new challenges and projects. Let's work together to create amazing solutions!

educationItems.institution: Federal University of Uberlândia - Monte Carmelo
educationItems.description: Learning in software development at all stages, databases, modeling and software engineering, artificial intelligence, among others.

educationItems.institution: Luiz Otávio Miranda and Matheus Fraga
educationItems.description: Interface development with React, Next, and Node on the Backend

educationItems.institution: São Paulo State University Júlio de Mesquita Filho
educationItems.description: Development of Desktop and Web systems, Computer Networks

experienceItems.description: Implementation of new features and creation of interfaces from scratch.
Assisting in the Internet Programming course, helping students with questions and exercise corrections.
Managing high-impact advertising campaigns on platforms such as Facebook Ads and Google Ads, as well as sales strategies and administrative routine.
Administrative routine such as document organization, customer service, mail management, spreadsheet creation, and public service.
